Name: The House
About the game: EXPLORE: Search through the house to find the 5 keys you need to unlock the front door and escape. SOLVE: Solve the puzzles to enter the rooms that could hold what you need. You'll need to use your flashlight to help you find the clues needed to solve the puzzles. SURVIVE: Sometimes turning off your flashlight isn't a bad thing. Avoid the thing chasing you by either running away or hiding so you won't become a permanent resident of THE HOUSE!!!
Meta Title: The House: Oct 29, 2021, HalfLabs Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The House? Check out the release date (Oct 29, 2021), developer insights from HalfLabs Studio, and a complete game summary.
